code: private static FsInfo stats(FsProbe probe, FsInfo initialValue, Logger logger, @Nullable ClusterInfo clusterInfo) {     try {         return probe.stats(initialValue, clusterInfo).     } catch (IOException e) {         logger.debug("unexpected exception reading filesystem info", e).         return null.     } }
@Override protected FsInfo refresh() {     return stats(probe, initialValue, logger, clusterInfoService.getClusterInfo()). }
